summary:
• Marketing executive with over 15 years of experience in Silicon Valley and Europe
• Hands-on leader with a broad skillset encompassing all facets of Marketing, delivering results under pressure and adjusting to fast-changing environments
• Proven track record of growing and scaling B2B and B2C companies, having been a member of teams that led to successful exits such as Endicia (Newell Rubbermaid), VerticalResponse (Deluxe), Demandforce (Intuit), Nexmo (Vonage), Adyen (ADYEN)

• Lead and mentor a team comprised of a growth marketer, an SDR and 2 content specialists', 'title': 'Chief Marketing Officer', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 279565, 'name': 'Adyen', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQGCuaSq8TqalA/company-logo_400_400/0/1664880075658?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=qtuxXlU0UUvn3JvXu5Y3Z-G6plU5zCGnZRv7PlBLs6s', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/adyen/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'Adyen', 'description': None, 'title': 'Vice President, Marketing Technology & Analytics', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'Adyen', 'description': "• Drove a cross-channel digital strategy across SEA, SEO, programmatic, paid social, email based on our target audiences' buyer journeys, increasing MQL volume by 23% and decreasing costs by 18% in 2019
• Built strong sales and marketing alignment, establishing global lead follow-up processes including lifecycle definitions, lead scoring and SLAs with the SDR teams
• Brought a culture of data-driven thinking to the organization, leading the first ever attribution effort and gathering all touchpoints/activities to build a multitouch model
• Developed and drove adoption of a refreshed marketing and sales tech stack (Marketo, Salesforce, Segment…) to drive data-driven decisions
• Led and mentored a multidisciplinary team of 10+ digital marketers, lifecycle marketers, marketing operations specialists, data scientists, product managers and web engineers", 'title': 'Head of Growth Marketing', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'Adyen', 'description': None, 'title': 'Team Lead, Performance Marketing', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Adyen', 'description': None, 'title': 'Senior Manager, Demand Generation', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 3637074, 'name': 'LendingHome', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D560BAQGZDeJbcAVAKA/company-logo_400_400/0/1689129545838?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=qQ7bl9FfSsY3M4UGFASpt7ErJEsN4FwO8677FM_aJY4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/kiavi/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'San Francisco Bay Area', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Kiavi', 'description': '• Defined and executed the marketing plan for the new consumer homebuying segment, devising growth strategies to convert borrowers at each stage of the funnel, crafting touchpoints using various channels (email, SMS, direct mail) in collaboration with the sales team, taking our product from beta stage to 100 monthly closed loans in less than a year in 2017
• Launched nurture and remarketing programs for our fix and flip segment, as well as lead scoring and sales automation for our sales team, which helped grow closed loans 48% YOY in 2016
• Led the cross-functional effort (product, engineering, sales ops) of re-architecting how customer data flows between our systems (Marketo, Salesforce, internal CRM), which enabled us to refine MQL definitions upstream, launch lead scoring and sales automation, among other things
• Refactored our tracking of lead sources to enable marketing attribution, leading us to effectively measure which channels convert best and make data-driven decisions on where to invest
• Led and mentored a team consisting of a content marketer and a marketing operations manager to execute against company goals', 'title': 'Senior Manager, Lifecycle Marketing', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 6384562, 'name': 'ForUs, Inc.', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQFTYfHnz9xqXA/company-logo_400_400/0/1635204521141?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=JdDkoxP-DJns0x2OSqTC-q7f4yhOOi04SbfE0qQVdT0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/forusall/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'San Francisco Bay Area', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'ForUsAll', 'description': '• Launched integrated lead generation campaigns targeting small businesses across multiple verticals to drive demos for our sales team, consistently growing our customer base 30% MOM
• Implemented and managed marketing systems (Marketo, Salesforce) that allowed us to nurture and accurately track inbound leads at each stage of the funnel
• Developed an editorial calendar to create content that appealed to our target personas, establishing thought leadership in the small business 401(k) space and boosting our organic traffic', 'title': 'Director of Demand Generation', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 1345545, 'name': 'Nexmo', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQGNHq8tdSu5bQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519888120238?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=B52fJpmgGW7T8Bl4SpuYx9Q7jm9gU8zkRklsA2HVaOQ', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/nexmo/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'San Francisco Bay Area', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'Nexmo (now Vonage)', 'description': "•	Optimized the customer journey, identifying key buyer personas and building both demand generation and customer retention programs to increase lead conversion and product usage across small- and enterprise-sized customers
•	Defined the web marketing strategy, managing Nexmo's online properties and ensuring they were a consistent source of quality inbound leads
•	Built a best-in-class marketing operations engine, implementing best practices and tool usage (Marketo, Salesforce) to ensure database cleanliness, campaign effectiveness and pipeline contribution", 'title': 'Direct Marketing Manager', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 89760, 'name': 'Demandforce', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQEv5OtgpoyB3g/company-logo_400_400/0/1519875447346?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=LPJjzg941J2lHG092i_eSyPhUqev5WW70ix5UXJSXYc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/demandforce/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'San Francisco Bay Area', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'Demandforce', 'description': '• Launched and optimized lead nurturing and remarketing campaigns across all Demandforce verticals, implementing best practices for marketing automation and email marketing, increasing lead to demo conversion rates by 26% YOY
• Planned, executed and optimized end-of-quarter sales promotions, collaborating cross-functionally with sales, design and operations teams, increasing opportunity to close rates by 81% YOY
• Developed content marketing initiatives in partnership with customer-facing teams to generate inbound leads (new Resources section, prospect webinars…), increasing that lead channel by 53% YOY', 'title': 'Manager, Lead Lifecycle', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 26332, 'name': 'VerticalResponse', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGyJgscrFZ0ZQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856615220?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=fd5sdPYxpJghfVh9NQedqFlIfQUn1B1gsXR5SsMimso', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/verticalresponse/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'San Francisco Bay Area', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'VerticalResponse', 'description': '• Owned the marketing automation program and lead nurturing process, implementing the use of drip marketing tactics and funnel analysis using Marketo and interfacing with the sales team to optimize customer conversion rates to a database of over 1 million records
• Ran revenue-generating and customer-acquiring promotions across all channels (Direct, Partner, Salesforce), developing testing roadmaps, email strategy and reporting dashboards
• Wrote, edited and proofed articles for the various VerticalResponse marketing properties (website, blog, webinars...)', 'title': 'Marketing Programs Manager', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 81484, 'name': 'Endicia', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQEgjNRjbvXa8w/company-logo_400_400/0/1519938205975?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=KTZ5UmGDcFGDgjCrWHMhKITgEnLOy8SlOX1lEVl-yzM', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/endicia/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'San Francisco Bay Area', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'company': 'Endicia', 'description': '• Defined product strategy and positioning in order to expand Endicia’s presence to a global market, increasing international revenue by 52% YOY in 2010
• Led the go-to-market strategy, promotion and launch of international product releases, interfacing with both internal teams and international partners
• Coordinated the development and launch of new domestic shipping desktop software and web application releases
• Developed and executed Endicia’s online marketing programs, which included an SEO plan (increasing organic search traffic by 213% YOY in 2010), the company’s social media presence and email marketing strategy (implementing Silverpop and managing hundreds of thousands of emails monthly)
• Collected competitive intelligence on Endicia’s market segment, presenting quarterly SWOT analyses to upper management and providing strategic recommendations', 'title': 'Marketing Manager', 'employment_type': None}]}]
